title: Wayne Rooney holidays with kids in Barbados while Coleen stays at home
text:
Wayne is sunning himself in Barbados (Picture: Queensofthenorth/MEGA)

Wayne Rooney is making the most of his family’s half-term holiday, despite the drama circling his wife Coleen.

Coleen, 33, sparked the social media scandal of 2019 when she accused fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy of leaking fake stories to the press from Coleen’s Instagram stories.

But her husband and kids seemed pretty chill as they holidayed in Barbados.

Wayne, 33, was seen touching down in Barbados to join his in-laws Colette and Anthony McLoughlin and his sons Kai, nine, Klay, six and three-year-old Kit.

Wayne joined his kids and in-laws at the resort (Picture: Queensofthenorth/MEGA)

It’s been a stressful few weeks for the Rooneys (Picture: Queensofthenorth/MEGA)

Wayne later changed into a t-shirt (Picture: MEGA)

The footballer was pictured with two suitcases at the airport, as he was dressed in a baseball cap and a tracksuit – which we can’t help but assume was a bit overheated in that climate.

Wayne was later seen joining his kids and Coleen’s parents at the beach, with the DC United star changing into a t-shirt.

The Rooney boys seemed to be having a ball as they skimmed stones in the sea and built sandcastles.

Coleen and her youngest son, one-year-old Cass, were forced to skip the holiday after she fell ill with an infection.

Klay enjoyed skipping stones (Picture: MEGA)

Kit seemed to be having a whale of a time (Picture: MEGA)

Breaking her silence amid Vardygate, she tweeted a picture of her baby boy, who was all wrapped up in a padded gilet.

Coleen wrote: ‘Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass. We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break. Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave.

‘I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better.’

Coleen’s mum Colette joined in on the fun (Picture: Charlie Pitt/246paps/MEGA

Coleen was forced to stay home with Cass (Picture: Shaun Botterill/Getty Images)

Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass. We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break. Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave. I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better pic.twitter.com/n2f1RZ4426 — Coleen Rooney (@ColeenRoo) October 20, 2019

She added to a fan: ‘Thought I’d put it out there before the stories start, as my children are getting photographed there and am not with them.’

The Rooney family holiday comes nearly two weeks after Coleen dropped the bombshell that Jamie Vardy’s wife Rebekah was allegedly leaking stories about her to the press.

Coleen suspected that a friend was behind the leaks so set up a rather ingenious scheme to catch them out – planting fake Instagram stories that only her suspect could see and waiting to see if they surfaced in the press.

Rebekah, 37, has denied the allegations, tweeting: ‘’m not being funny but I don’t need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you? I liked you a lot Coleen and I’m so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I’m heavily pregnant.

‘I’m disgusted that I’m even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened.’

It is believed Rebekah is having a forensic investigation carried out on her Instagram to prove she wasn’t behind the leaks.
